title: Greating
description: You are in a grateful mood. You know how to appreciate the work of your fellow developers and appreciate what they bring to you every day.

title: In love
description: You are in the mood for love. It even looks like you're about to bite into the apple :-)

title: Jumping
description: You are in a happy mood! Nothing seems to be able to stop you from jumping all over the place!

title: Leaning
description: It looks like you're in the mood to lean on something.

title: Naughty
description: You're in a naughty mood. Your colleagues should think twice before speaking to you today.

title: Sharing
description: Vous êtes d'humeur à tout partager aujourd'hui, y compris votre dernier très cher smartphone!

title: Waving
description: You seem to be very waving today. Take a break!

title: Winter
description: You are in the mood to go ice skating today. It speaks for itself, doesn't it?
